message: I am interested in merging his fork back into Errbit. I think that all of his changes are useful, especially the UI
I'm really glad you guys like the UI changes. I like the idea of merging boblail/errbit back into errbit/errbit as well.
FWIW, here are some of the things I was planning on adding to Errbit next: https://github.com/boblail/errbit/issues
As I mentioned on the other thread, in a week or two, I'll get to work wrapping up the Errs->Problems migration and starting to rebase boblail/errbit onto errbit/errbit.
I'm part-way through the rebase of my changes onto boblail/errbit@rebase-master. I've pushed the UI changes to https://github.com/boblail/errbit/commits/ui-updates.
